an3.23:1.1: “These three people are found in the world.
an3.23:1.3: Firstly, a certain person makes hurtful choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.23:1.4: Having made these choices, they’re reborn in a hurtful world,
an3.23:1.6: Touched by hurtful contacts, they experience hurtful feelings that are exclusively painful—like the beings in hell.
an3.23:2.1: Furthermore, another person makes pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.23:2.2: Having made these choices, they are reborn in a pleasing world,
an3.23:2.4: Touched by pleasing contacts, they experience pleasing feelings that are exclusively happy—like the gods replete with glory.
an3.23:3.1: Furthermore, another person makes both hurtful and pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.23:3.2: Having made these choices, they are reborn in a world that is both hurtful and pleasing,
an3.23:3.3: where hurtful and pleasing contacts touch them.
an3.23:3.4: Touched by both hurtful and pleasing contacts, they experience both hurtful and pleasing feelings that are a mixture of pleasure and pain—like humans, some gods, and some beings in the underworld.
an3.23:3.5: These are the three people found in the world.”
